title: sa_yājñavalkyasmṛti
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
      <div type='adhyāya' n='1'>
	<pb edRef='#Acharya1949' n='1'/>
	<head>ācārādhyāya</head>

	<note type='subheading'>1. upodghāta-prakaraṇam</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.1'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yogīśvaraṃ yājñavalkyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃpūjya munayo 'bruvan</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varṇāśrametarāṇāṃ no</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brūhi dharmān aśeṣataḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.1'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yogi-īśvaraṃ yājñavalkyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃpūjya munayo 'bruvan</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varṇa-āśrama-itarāṇāṃ no</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brūhi dharmān aśeṣataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<pb edRef='#Acharya1949' n='2'/>
	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.2'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mithilāsthaḥ sa yogīndraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvābravīn munīn</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmin deśe mṛgaḥ kṛṣṇas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmin dharmān nibodhata</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.2'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mithilā-sthaḥ sa yogi-indraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇaṃ dhyātva ābravīn munīn</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmin deśe mṛgaḥ kṛṣṇas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmin dharmān nibodhata</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.3'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purāṇanyāyamīmāṃsā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmaśāstrāṅgamiśritāḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmasya ca caturdaśa</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.3'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purāṇa-nyāya-mīmāṃsā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharma-śāstra-aṅga-miśritāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmasya ca caturdaśa</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<pb edRef='#Acharya1949' n='3'/>
	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.4'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manvatriviṣṇuhārīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yājñavalkyośano 'ṅgirāḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yamāpastambasaṃvartāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kātyāyanabṛhaspatī</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.4'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manv-atri-viṣṇu-hārīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yājñavalkya-uśano 'ṅgirāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yama-āpastamba-saṃvartāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kātyāyana-bṛhaspatī</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.5'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parāśaravyāsaśaṅkha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>likhitā dakṣagautamau</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śātātapo vasiṣṭhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmaśāstraprayojakāḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.5'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parāśara-vyāsa-śaṅkha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>likhitā dakṣa-gautamau</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śātātapo vasiṣṭhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharma-śāstra-prayojakāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.6'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deśe kāla upāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dravyaṃ śraddhāsamanvitam</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pātre pradīyate yat tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakalaṃ dharmalakṣaṇam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.6'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deśe kāla upāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dravyaṃ śraddhā-samanvitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pātre pradīyate yat tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakalaṃ dharma-lakṣaṇam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<pb edRef='#Acharya1949' n='4'/>
	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.7'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ sadācāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasya ca priyam ātmanaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samyaksaṃkalpajaḥ kāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmamūlam idaṃ smṛtam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.7'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ sad-ācāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasya ca priyam ātmanaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samyak-saṃkalpajaḥ kāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharma-mūlam idaṃ smṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.8'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ijyācāradamāhiṃsā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dānasvādhyāyakarmaṇām</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ tu paramo dharmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad yogenātmadarśanam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.8'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ijyā-ācāra-dama-ahiṃsā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāna-svādhyāya-karmaṇām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ tu paramo dharmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad yogenā atma-darśanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.9'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catvāro vedadharmajñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parṣat traividyam eva vā</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā brūte yaṃ sa dharmaḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eko vādhyātmavittamaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.9'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catvāro veda-dharmajñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parṣat traividyam eva vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā brūte yaṃ sa dharmaḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eko va ādhyātmavittamaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>



	<pb edRef='#Acharya1949' n='5'/>
	<note type='subheading'>2. brahma-cāri-prakaraṇam</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.10'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmakṣatriyaviṭśūdrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṇās tv ādyās trayo dvijāḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣekādyāḥ śmaśānāntās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ vai mantrataḥ kriyāḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.10'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahma-kṣatriya-viṭ-śūdrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṇās tv ādyās trayo dvijāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣeka-ādyāḥ śmaśāna-antās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ vai mantrataḥ kriyāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.11'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>garbhādhānam ṛtau puṃsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>savanaṃ spandanāt purā</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaṣṭhe 'ṣṭame vā sīmanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māsy ete jātakarma ca</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.11'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>garbha-ādhānam ṛtau puṃsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>savanaṃ spandanāt purā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaṣṭhe 'ṣṭame vā sīmanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māsy ete jāta-karma ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.12'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahany ekādaśe nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caturthe māsi niṣkramaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaṣṭhe 'nnaprāśanaṃ māsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cūḍā kāryā yathākulam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.12'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahany ekādaśe nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caturthe māsi niṣkramaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaṣṭhe 'nna-prāśanaṃ māsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cūḍā kāryā yathā-kulam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<pb edRef='#Acharya1949' n='6'/>
	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.13'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam enaḥ śamaṃ yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bījagarbhasamudbhavam</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tūṣṇīm etāḥ kriyāḥ strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivāhas tu samantrakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.13'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam enaḥ śamaṃ yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bīja-garbha-samudbhavam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tūṣṇīm etāḥ kriyāḥ strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivāhas tu sa-mantrakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.14'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>garbhāṣṭame 'ṣṭame vābde</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇasyopanāyanam</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājñām ekādaśe saike</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśām eke yathākulam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.14'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>garbha-aṣṭame 'ṣṭame va ābde</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇasya upanāyanam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājñām ekādaśe sa aike</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśām eke yathā-kulam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.15'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upanīya guruḥ śiṣyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāvyāhṛtipūrvakam</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vedam adhyāpayed enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaucācārāṃś ca śikṣayet</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.15'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upanīya guruḥ śiṣyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-vyāhṛti-pūrvakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vedam adhyāpayed enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śauca-ācārāṃś ca śikṣayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<pb edRef='#Acharya1949' n='7'/>
	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.16'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divāsaṃdhyāsu karṇastha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmasūtrodaṅmukhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuryān mūtrapurīṣe ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rātrau ced dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.16'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divā-saṃdhyāsu karṇastha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahma-sūtra-udaṅ-mukhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuryān mūtra-purīṣe ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rātrau ced dakṣiṇā-mukhaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.17'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhītaśiśnaś cotthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛdbhir abhyuddhṛtair jalaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandhalepakṣayakaraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaucaṃ kuryād atandritaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.17'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhīta-śiśnaś ca utthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛdbhir abhyuddhṛtair jalaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandha-lepa-kṣaya-karaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaucaṃ kuryād atandritaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.18'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antarjānu śucau deśa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upaviṣṭa udaṅmukhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāg vā brāhmeṇa tīrthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvijo nityam upaspṛśet</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.18'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antar-jānu śucau deśa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upaviṣṭa udaṅ-mukhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāg vā brāhmeṇa tīrthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvijo nityam upaspṛśet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.19'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaniṣṭhādeśinyaṅguṣṭha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūlāny agraṃ karasya ca</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajāpatipitṛbrahma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>devatīrthāny anukramāt</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.19'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaniṣṭhā-deśiny-aṅguṣṭha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūlāny agraṃ karasya ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajāpati-pitṛ-brahma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>deva-tīrthāny anukramāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<pb edRef='#Acharya1949' n='8'/>
	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.20'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>triḥ prāśyāpo dvir unmṛjya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khāny adbhiḥ samupaspṛśet</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adbhis tu prakṛtisthābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hīnābhiḥ phenabudbudaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.20'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>triḥ prāśya apo dvir unmṛjya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khāny adbhiḥ samupaspṛśet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adbhis tu prakṛtisthābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hīnābhiḥ phena-budbudaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.21'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛtkaṇṭhatālugābhis tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dvijātayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śudhyeran strī ca śūdraś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakṛt spṛṣṭābhir antataḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.21'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛt-kaṇṭha-tālugābhis tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā-saṃkhyaṃ dvijātayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śudhyeran strī ca śūdraś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakṛt spṛṣṭābhir antataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.22'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snānam abdaivatair mantrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārjanaṃ prāṇasaṃyamaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sūryasya cāpy upasthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāyatryāḥ pratyahaṃ japaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.22'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snānam ab-daivatair mantrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārjanaṃ prāṇa-saṃyamaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sūryasya ca apy upasthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāyatryāḥ pratyahaṃ japaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='YajñS_1.23'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gāyatrīṃ śirasā sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>japed vyāhṛtipūrvikām</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratipraṇavasaṃyuktāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trir ayaṃ prāṇasaṃyamaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#YajñS_1.23'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gāyatrīṃ śirasā sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>japed vyāhṛti-pūrvikām</seg> /</l>
